Pre-Game Insights: HARDIK PANDYA will play with a single change in the playing 11 against West Indies in the 4th T20I.
The match will be held at the Central Broward Regional Park Stadium in Lauderdale, Florida.
If the series goes in favor of West Indies, Team India might use Hardik Pandya as a captain with key changes.
Miscellaneous Highlights: YASHVANT JHAVAL and SHUBHAM GILL have been given the opening partnership in the first three T20Is against West Indies.
SANJU SHANSHAN will also take wicket-keeping duties in this match.
ARSHDEEP SINGH, YUVENDRA CHAHAL, KULDIP YADAV, and HARIDEEP SINGH are also part of the playing 11.
UMRAN MALIK, who bowled well in the previous three T20Is, might not bowl much in this match.
MUKEESH KUMAR might get a rest in this match, giving Umran Malik a chance to rest.
